mapper.insert: insert into shorts(sSeq, sTitle, id, upload, sContent) values(shorts_seq.NEXTVAL, #{sTitle}, #{id}, #{upload}, #{sContent})
mapper.update: update shorts set sTitle=#{sTitle}, id=#{id}, upload=#{upload}, sContent=#{sContent} where sSeq=#{sSeq}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM shorts WHERE sTitle like '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%' ORDER BY sSeq DESC
